akas: Chuggington - Die Loks sind los! Germany
akas from release info: Chuggington - Die Loks sind los! Germany

1.title: First Responder Calley
1.plot: Calley is upset because she doesn't have a special talent, but after a series of tests, she is made the first responder of the Chug Patrol.

2.title: Sinkhole Rescue
2.plot: Wilson learns some alternative uses for some of the chug patrol cars and Brewster gets trapped in a sink hole. Can Wilson rescue him in time?

3.title: Cormac Patrol
3.plot: Cormac gets increasingly bored when the docks are shut until he's called to rescue Jackman, Asher and Calley who are trapped behind a rockfall.

4.title: Trainee Camp
4.plot: Wilson, Brewster, Koko, Hoot and Toot learn the arts of improvisation and teamwork during a training exercise.

5.title: Tour Guide Harrison
5.plot: Harrison looks around Chuggington to find a suitable place to take his passengers during a tour guide examination.

6.title: Delivery Challenge
6.plot: Cormac challenges Old Puffer Peter to a delivery contest and Pete proves that slow and steady wins the race.

7.title: Koko Express
7.plot: Koko learns to go carefully as well as fast whilst training to be an express courier.

8.title: Skipper Stu and the Steam Crane
8.plot: When the crane at the docks breaks down, Skipper Stu has to rely on an old steam crane to get the ship loaded in time.

9.title: Chug Patrol Chief
9.plot: Icy conditions cause a great deal of problems when Jackman needs fuel from the inaccessible docks.

10.title: Fletch Shines
10.plot: Fletch takes on the task of repairing the lighthouse, but being in charge isn't as easy as he thinks.

1.title: Can't Catch Koko
1.plot: When Harrison breaks down, Koko volunteers to replace him on the night shift, determined to make the fastest run ever.

2.title: Wilson and the Elephant
2.plot: Wilson has to transport a troublesome elephant called Ebo to his new home.

3.title: Clunky Wilson
3.plot: Wilson damages his wheels during a race and is too scared to go to the repair shed after hearing a story about Old Puffer Pete spending a week there having his wheels removed.

4.title: Koko and the Tunnel
4.plot: Koko wants to know where a certain tunnel leads to and sneaks down it with Wilson.

5.title: Braking Brewster
5.plot: Brewster doesn't listen to Dunbar and goes too fast down a hill with a heavy hopper car full of quarry rocks. Can Wilson help Brewster brake before it's too late?

6.title: Hodge and the Magnet
6.plot: Part of the track is out, and there's chaos in Chuggington so Wilson and Hodge decide to fix the tracks themselves without waiting for Eddie.

7.title: Koko and the Squirrels
7.plot: After a near-miss with some squirrels, Koko learns the hard way that sometimes it's best to be slow and steady. She also learns that Old Puffer Pete can be great fun, too.

8.title: Wilson Gets a Wash
8.plot: Wilson likes being muddy and wants to avoid the chug-wash at all costs. Also, the three trainees learn how to stop in muddy and wet conditions.

9.title: Brewster Goes Bananas
9.plot: A monkey from the safari park causes havoc around the Chuggington depot.

10.title: Bang Klang Wilson
10.plot: Wilson, Koko and Brewster must learn how to use the ice-cream cars. Unfortunately, Wilson breaks his and has to use a very complicated old one. Will he master the antique car in time?

11.title: Old Puffer Pete's Tour
11.plot: Wilson, Koko and Brewster learn that Old Puffer Pete isn't just old and boring, he is old, wise and fun.

12.title: Late Again Eddie
12.plot: Eddie is always late so the Chuggers decide to find him a home in Chuggington, nearer to his workplace.

13.title: Wilson's Smooth Moves
13.plot: The chuggers are learning to carry passengers comfortably, using dummies specially made to wobble if the ride isn't silky smooth.

14.title: Cool Wilson
14.plot: Wilson gets excited when he hears that Frostini needs a helper during the school holiday.

15.title: The Chugger Championship
15.plot: Koko falls out with the other Chuggers during training for the annual Chugger Championship race due to her bad attitude. Does she have what it takes to come first?

16.title: Action Brewster
16.plot: Brewster is excited about seeing the new Action Chugger movie, but he is sent to the foundry and is worried that he won't be back in time.

17.title: Brewster and the Dragon
17.plot: A storm has left the Safari Park in a bit of chaos, and some animals have escaped.

18.title: Outward Bound Olwin
18.plot: Olwin takes every group of new trainees out on an outward bound training course where she teaches them navigating skills to be used in the event of bad weather or emergencies.

19.title: Koko on Call
19.plot: Twiga the giraffe is about to give birth and Koko is given the task of keeping an eye on her overnight and fetching Dr. Gosling the vet.

20.title: Zephie's Zoomaround
20.plot: After getting lost, Zephie is given a bell for emergencies. The siren is taken away from her because she uses it too often. Later, she topples over and needs help, but no longer has her siren. What will she do?

21.title: Koko's Puppy Training
21.plot: Koko finds a lost puppy and wants to keep it, but she realises a little girl is looking for the puppy and decides that she needs to take him home. Also, Koko, Wilson and Brewster do some paper delivery training.

22.title: Wake Up Wilson
22.plot: Wilson stays up all night and is late with his first mail run.

23.title: Brewster Knows Best
23.plot: The trainees take part in a sign-reading exercise. Wilson and Koko think Brewster is too slow, but Brewster is only being careful and is the first to receive an extra-special surprise.

24.title: Koko Pulls It Off
24.plot: The trainees take their passenger test under the strict eye of Mr Simpkins. The abrupt examiner makes Koko cry and Irving feels that he needs to have a word with Mr Simpkins.

25.title: Wilson and the Ice Cream
25.plot: Wilson gets distracted from his job of delivering ice-cream cars to the ice-cream fair and tries to take all the cars at once to make up for lost time. He realises he may have to ask the great Frostini for help.

26.title: Wilson's Wacky Tour
26.plot: Children from Chuggington School are coming to the Safari Park, and Mtambo is training Wilson and Brewster to help out as junior guides.

27.title: Hodge's Secret
27.plot: Hodge wants to be more independent, but Eddie never lets him do jobs on his own. So when Wilson startles Hodge, causing him to accidentally break a junction box, Hodge decides to deal with it himself.

28.title: Frostini's Fruit Fandango
28.plot: Wilson is assisting Frostini as he creates a new flavour for the mayor's banquet: Chugstastic Chewy Cheesecake. But they discover that the mayor's wife is allergic to cheese. Frostini will have to come up with something else urgently.

29.title: Zephie the Ace Reporter
29.plot: When Zephie's job with Morgan is taken by a rail-going cycle, Zephie decides to get a new job as an ace reporter just like Rag Barnstaple.

30.title: Famous Emery
30.plot: A film crew is coming to Chuggington and Emery is sure he can get in the film. The film crew finally spot Emery's talent and make him the presenter of the film, but he ends up going too far with his jokes and offends all of his friends.

31.title: Watch Out Wilson!
31.plot: The trainees are trying their wheels at pushing rolling stock around an obstacle course backwards. Wilson has some trouble until Morgan gives him some wing mirrors.

32.title: Brewster's Hobby
32.plot: Brewster and Wilson begin a new hobby of "people spotting". Unfortunately, they get so wrapped up in their new hobby that they forget to do their jobs.

33.title: Zephie's Monkey Business
33.plot: Zephie has never worked in the Safari Park before, so she's excited to be taking the vet, Dr. Gosling, to give the animals their check-ups.

34.title: Poor Old Puffer Pete
34.plot: Brewster and Zephie think Old Puffer Pete is going to be scrapped so they decide to prove how useful the old engine still is. Unfortunately, they don't realise that it's Pete's old tender car that's going to be scrapped, not Pete himself.

35.title: Inspector Emery
35.plot: Old 'Picky Nicky' Inspector Nicholas is coming to conduct Chuggington Depot's annual inspection. The chuggers swing into action getting things ready. Emery really wants to help, but ends up causing more chaos.

36.title: Nurse Wilson
36.plot: Dunbar looses his voice during a training session with the ambulance car. Wilson thinks he can make Dunbar better and, eventually, he does.

37.title: Mtambo's Amazing Adventure
37.plot: Mtambo's in a bit of a rut giving the same old tours everyday in the Safari Park. He wants some adventures in his life so that he has new stories to tell. Eventually, he realises that he can have fantastic adventures at home.

38.title: Rock-a-Bye Chatsworth
38.plot: Chatsworth has had a very busy day and wants a quick snooze, but everything and everyone conspires to keep him awake.

39.title: Helpful Hodge
39.plot: Koko challenges Hodge to a competition: whoever does the most jobs that day wins.

40.title: Brewster to the Rescue
40.plot: Koko, Wilson and Brewster are learning about emergency rescues with Calley. Brewster is convinced that he will never be able to rescue anyone, but he later saves Chatsworth from a fire and is given a special badge for bravery.

41.title: Wilson and the Paint Wagon
41.plot: The trainees are taught how to use the paint wagons. Wilson has some trouble until Old Puffer Pete gives him some extra tuition.

42.title: Eddie Finds Time
42.plot: Eddie Finds Time: The depot clock is broken, and the schedule is in chaos! Eddie needs to go to Old Town to see if he can borrow a part from the old clock to repair the depot clock. Brewster Knows Best: The trainees are doing a sign-reading exercise. If they work as a team and follow the signs correctly - there'll be a wonderful surprise at the end of it.

43.title: Mtambo's Royal Tour
43.plot: Vee announces that the King of Buffertonia is coming for a tour of the Safari Park. Mtambo wants to give the best tour ever, so he does a practice run - with Hodge pretending to be the king.

44.title: Wilson and the Wild Wind
44.plot: Wilson starts messing around with the new storm maker causing chaos in the depot.

45.title: Old Puffer Pete's Firebox
45.plot: Old Puffer Pete needs a new firebox. He can't puff around by himself without one. He manages to find one in an unlikely place.

46.title: Jet Pack Wilson
46.plot: Wilson, Koko and Brewster are being trained by their hero Action Chugger for the day. Wilson wants to be just like his hero and takes a jet pack and blasts into the skies, but he doesn't know how to come back down to earth again.

47.title: Brewster's Little Helper
47.plot: Zephie wants to pull freight just like Brewster. She decides to help him in secret and starts messing up his deliveries. Soon, she derails and finally understands that she is not built for hauling heavy loads.

48.title: Bubbly Olwin
48.plot: A photographer is coming to take pictures of the steam engines and Olwin wants to look her best. Unfortunately, she gets covered in mud and gets soapy elephant wash in her tank. Soon, she's blowing bubbles and very embarrassed.

49.title: Koko Takes Charge
49.plot: Irving leaves Koko in charge of the recycling yard. Wilson comes to assist her and soon the place is in a terrible state. Can they clean it up before Irving returns?

50.title: Wilson's Paper Trail
50.plot: Wilson needs to collect some special hand-made paper for a printer, but it gets ruined.

51.title: Puffer Pete's Big Show
51.plot: It's Old Puffer Pete's one-hundred-and-fiftieth anniversary and the youngest chuggers are to put on a show for him, but they can't get it right.

52.title: Training Time Harrison
52.plot: Harrison is made to go back to training if he wants to pull the Prince of Buffertonia after he ignores railway regulations.

1.title: Snowstruck Wilson
1.plot: Wilson does not listen to Harrison when the pair go out to plough snow. Soon, Wilson gets stuck in a freezing cold tunnel and Harrison can't get him out. Will anybody see or hear them signalling for help?

2.title: Frostini's Meltdown
2.plot: The power goes out in Chuggington and Frostini's ice-cream is melting. Speedy McAllister takes Frostini to an ice tunnel to keep the ice-cream cool.

3.title: Koko's New Look
3.plot: Koko and Zephie compete to see who can get the best design.

4.title: Babysitter Brewster
4.plot: Brewster has to teach Hoot and Toot to use the turntable safely, buy the mischievous duo run away. They soon get trapped on a turntable, but can they remember Brewster's training?

5.title: Heave Ho Harrison
5.plot: While plowing the rails after a snowstorm, Harrison gets stuck in a large snowdrift and everyone tries to pull him out.

6.title: Lights Camera Action Chugger
6.plot: Emery is given the job of "runner" on the new Action Chugger film set and makes a nuisance of himself. Meanwhile, Brewster is spending the day doing boring litter-picking, but he soon gets an exciting new challenge.

7.title: Chug of War
7.plot: To decide who is going to work down the mines, the chuggers hold a tug-of-war competition with snooty Harrison and old Speedy McAllister as the team captains.

8.title: Hodge Sails Away
8.plot: Thanks to the strong winds and a loose tarpaulin, Hodge is blown all around Chuggington.

9.title: Stop the Press Emery
9.plot: Emery wants to get on the newspaper's front page. His wish comes true when he accidentally ruins Mr. Mistereoso's magic show. Emery is very upset, but Mr. Mistereoso has an idea which might save the show.

10.title: Hoot v. Toot
10.plot: Hoot and Toot fall out after Hoot decides to take the lead for once and makes a mess of their jobs. It turns out that Hoot only does this because he is colour-blind and cannot tell the difference between green and red.

11.title: The Brewster Booster
11.plot: Brewster is given a new booster to test, but it goes wrong and Brewster does not tell Dr. Ling about it. Hodge later borrows the booster and is put in great danger.

12.title: Quizmaster Hodge
12.plot: Hodge is asked to take over quiz night when quizmaster Harrison loses his voice. Unfortunately, Hodge breaks his axle and because he is one-of-a-kind, finding another one in time for the quiz will be tricky.

13.title: Scrub-a-Chug
13.plot: Wilson tries to help Eddie by cleaning the tunnels, but he only makes things worse. Can he clean it all up before Eddie arrives?

14.title: Wilson and the Dinosaur
14.plot: Wilson is tasked with taking some pictures with a camera car and Hoot and Toot are delivering a model dinosaur to the museum.

15.title: Next Stop - Space
15.plot: Dr. Ling gives a lecture on meteorites and how one nearly crashed into Chuggington many years ago. This scares Hoot and Toot who attempt to send a museum exhibit of a meteorite back into space to get rid of it.

16.title: Chilly Chuggers
16.plot: An ice storm hits Chuggington and the trainees are told to stay in their roundhouse. Koko really wants to help so does not listen Vee's instruction and ends up causing problems.

17.title: Stunt Brewster
17.plot: Brewster takes part in an Action Chugger movie quite by accident when he performs a stunt to save Koko from derailing.

18.title: Wilson's Icy Escapade
18.plot: Wilson and Koko are given the task of sanding the icy rails, but Wilson's sand gets wet and won't spread. Can he dry it out before Olwin arrives on the mountain track?

19.title: Rolling Reporter Wilson
19.plot: Hoot and Toot try to help Wilson with his news report.

20.title: Zephie and the Bees
20.plot: Zephie is swarmed by bees after she accidentally knocks their hive out of a tree. Speedy McAllister comes to her rescue and, together, they find the bees a new home.

21.title: Brewster Meets the Mayor
21.plot: Brewster is to take Mayor Pullman over the Border Bridge in a ceremony to reopen it. During the practice run, it becomes apparent that the bridge is not safe. Can the bridge be repaired in time?

22.title: Chugger of the Year
22.plot: Mayor Pullman is touring Chuggington with her nephew Denzil to observe the trains working so that she can award one of them with the prestigious title of "Chugger of the Year".

23.title: Fault Finder Emery
23.plot: The electronic defect detector malfunctions so Emery decides to take over its role. Emery is too cautious and soon sends every Chugger in Chuggington to be repaired which causes chaos.

24.title: Hodge and the Chugnav
24.plot: Hodge wants to be helpful so, with the help of the ChugNav, he goes to pick up an important part from far away. Unfortunately, the ChugNav goes wrong and he has to accompany Action Chugger into space to fix the satellite.

25.title: A Pat on the Paintwork
25.plot: Koko earns her high speed badge while Emery gets sidetracked by trying for some imaginary badges.

26.title: Toot's Tall Tale
26.plot: Toot pretends to be ill to get out of doing track inspection.

1.title: Gold Wheels
1.plot: Hoot and Toot want to earn a golden wheel award so that they will be given a surprise, but end up causing a big mess in the depot.

2.title: Special Helper Wilson
2.plot: Wilson wants to be Frostini's only special helper and pushes Hoot and Toot out. Eventually, he learns that three chuggers are better than one.

3.title: Hodge Can't Wait
3.plot: A show which showcases the latest pieces of rolling stock is the talk of Chuggington. Hodge overheats on the way to the show and has to think on his wheels to get rescued. Meanwhile, Harrison proves hard to work with on the track-walk.

4.title: Chug-o-flage
4.plot: Koko, Brewster and Wilson are doing their advanced safari training with Mtambo. Wilson gets his camouflage wrong and is chased around Chuggington by a charging rhino.

5.title: Koko's Game
5.plot: Koko becomes obsessed with a video game, trying to beat Hodge's high score. She becomes so hooked on the game that she neglects safety.

6.title: Magnetic Wilson
6.plot: After a run-in with a magnet car, Wilson himself becomes magnetic. Soon, Wilson is covered in scrap metal and the repair shed have no idea how to stop it. Luckily, Koko has an idea.

7.title: Zephie's Star Club
7.plot: Zephie starts a club and is very selective about who can be in it. Wilson starts his own club which Zephie is not pleased about. Soon, all of the chuggers are falling out and it's all Zephie's fault.

8.title: Undercover Action Chugger
8.plot: Action Chugger spends the day as an ordinary Chugger to prepare for a new movie role.

9.title: Movie-Maker Brewster
9.plot: Brewster makes a movie about Chuggington for Mayor Pullman which even impresses Action Chugger.

10.title: Top Secret Koko
10.plot: Koko has trouble keeping a secret from her friends.

11.title: Toot's New Friend
11.plot: A new steam engine called Piper arrives at Chuggington. Toot is jealous about all the attention she is getting, but soon realises the new Chugger could be a good new friend.

12.title: Skylar's Squad
12.plot: The trainees compete to be in Skylar's new rescue squad.

13.title: Wobbly Wheels
13.plot: Koko, Wilson and Brewster learn how to safely derail themselves to prevent accidents while new Chugger Piper sneaks out of the depot before she is ready.

14.title: Brewster's Crane Training
14.plot: Dunbar is leaving Chuggington for a while and leaves his trainees with new Chugger Skylar, but Wilson isn't sure he'll be able to manage without Dunbar.

1.title: Chug Patrol: Ready to Rescue
1.plot: In Control and Ready to Roll! Wilson, Koko and Brewster are moving up to the next level of training! In Chug Patrol: Ready to Rescue, the first ever, super-sized special, Wilson takes on new challenges and makes daring rescues as the newest member of Chuggington's emergency rescue squad. Koko and Brewster join in on the new adventures as do new characters Chug Patrol Chief Jackman and super-speedy Hanzo! Get those wheels to the rails for all new adventures in Chuggington!

2.title: Stop Koko Stop!
2.plot: Koko learns to use how to brake at high speeds and Brewster learns that he has a good eye for track-laying.

3.title: Runaway Koko
3.plot: Koko's speed booster malfunctions, sending her flying along the rails at high speeds. Can she ever be stopped?

4.title: Brewster Makes Tracks
4.plot: An old cooling tower is to be demolished and Brewster cannot wait to see the explosion, but he ends up helping out his friends instead.

5.title: Chief Wilson
5.plot: Wilson takes a test to assess his new Chug Patrol skills, but he forgets something important and fails. However, he later redeems himself by helping Old Puffer Pete.

6.title: Rescue at Rocky Ridge
6.plot: Not long after being recruited into the Chug Patrol Rescue Squad, Wilson has to save Koko from a collapsing mine.

7.title: Wilson's Forest Flare
7.plot: Chug Patroller Wilson learns all about different flares and rescues Emery when his brakes fail.

8.title: Back Up Brewster
8.plot: Brewster is learning to use the mega-chug crane and is forced to put his skills to the test when a collapsed bridge leaves Zack stranded.

9.title: Track Laying Brewster
9.plot: Rocky Ridge River bursts its banks leaving the Chuggineers stranded. Brewster must put his track-laying abilities to the test if he wants to save his friends.

10.title: Explorer Koko
10.plot: Mayor Pullman and her guests are to take a tour of Tootington and Koko must get them there in time. Unfortunately, her carriage suffers from mechanical failure and then has to take several detours. Will she get there in time?

11.title: The Old Silver Mine Line
11.plot: While practicing with the welder down an old line, Brewster and Koko get stranded. Luckily, Brewster is able to weld the broken track back together and save them both.

12.title: Brewster Leads the Way
12.plot: Brewster is put in charge of a team of chuggers who are to help him transport a very heavy tunnel boring machine. One-by-one the chuggers drop out, eventually leaving just Brewster. How will he manage on his own?

13.title: Park Patroller Wilson
13.plot: Old Puffer Pete starts sleep-riding around Chuggington. Can Wilson catch him before he causes trouble in the animal park?

14.title: High Rise Rescue
14.plot: Jackman teaches Wilson how to use the fire hose car and Hodge gets stuck high in the air when the window cleaning riser platform becomes jammed.

15.title: Winter Whiteout
15.plot: The chuggers prepare for the Winter Parade in Chuggington, but will thick fog prevent Mayor Pullman from attending?

16.title: Snow Patrol
16.plot: Fletch gets stuck in a snow-slide. Can Wilson free him before a snowstorm hits the mountains?

17.title: Fearless Wilson
17.plot: Wilson is taught how to use a speed booster. He has to put his new skills to the test to save Brewster from falling into the river.

18.title: Special Rescue Team
18.plot: After becoming tangled in a banner, Eddie has to be rescued by Wilson and Jackman.

19.title: Blazin' Wilson
19.plot: Wilson starts fire-training. However, he uses up all his water before he's called to extinguish a real fire.

20.title: On Track Brewster
20.plot: Wilson is on safety patrol while Tyne and Fletch demolish an old bridge and Brewster passes his first Chuggineer test by thinking on his wheels.

21.title: We Are the Chuggineers
21.plot: The Chuggineers complete their work on the bridge for the high-speed route to Tootington. Eagle-eyed Brewster saves the day so they decide to name the bridge after him.

22.title: Team Trainee
22.plot: The Chuggineers, Speed Fleet and Chug Patrol compete in the Track Dash fun race. However, Koko, Brewster and Wilson end up on their own team when Hanzo's brakes jam.

23.title: Record Breaker Koko
23.plot: Pace gets to know all of the Chuggers in Chuggington and helps Koko improve her speed.

24.title: The Tootington Tunnel
24.plot: The Chuggineers finish work on the Tootington Tunnel and the new route is declared open, but not before Brewster and Cormac have delivered the tunnel entrance.

26.title: Deputy Chug Patrollers
26.plot: Koko, Brewster and Wilson have a day off. Meanwhile, Chatsworth is helping with the filming of Action Chugger's latest movie and gets wedged in a tunnel.

27.title: Round Up Wilson
27.plot: After a failed attempt at evacuating a roundhouse, Wilson redeems himself by successfully rounding up the monkeys at the Safari Park.

30.title: Iron Chuggers
30.plot: The Steam Team take on the Chuggineers for a chance to win the Iron Chugger award.

-1.title: Record Breaker Hodge
-1.plot: Koko attempts to break a speed record at the Chug-a-Sonic Speedtrack. / The Chuggineers compete with the Steam Team for the coveted Iron Chuggers title.

imdb.plot outline: Chuggington, follows the humorous adventures of Koko, Wilson and Brewster, three trainee engines each with their own unique personality. Rounding out Chuggington's cast of characters is a modern, colorful fleet of engines including Puffer Pete, Action Chugger and Frostini, who help the trainees learn important lessons like cooperation, perseverance and respect. Throughout each traintastic episode, the trainees embark on different adventures where they learn to ride the rails of life and explore Chuggington, a safe and exciting world. Each episode is designed to teach simple, yet important, social-emotional lessons that help preschoolers prepare for their early learning years.
imdb.title: Chuggington
plot: _Chuggington_ (qv), follows the humorous adventures of Koko, Wilson and Brewster, three trainee engines each with their own unique personality. Rounding out _Chuggington_ (qv)'s cast of characters is a modern, colorful fleet of engines including Puffer Pete, Action Chugger and Frostini, who help the trainees learn important lessons like cooperation, perseverance and respect. Throughout each traintastic episode, the trainees embark on different adventures where they learn to ride the rails of life and explore _Chuggington_ (qv), a safe and exciting world. Each episode is designed to teach simple, yet important, social-emotional lessons that help preschoolers prepare for their early learning years.::Ludorum
